text: waetu man maat abawuhum wahum dun alblwgh, wakuntum ealayhim awsya', 'amwalahum 'iidha wasaluu sini alblwgh, wraytm minhum qudrat ealaa hifz amwalhm, wala takhudhuu aljyid min amwalhm, wtjelu makanah alrdy' min amwalkm, wala tkhltu 'amwalahum bamwalkm; lthtalu bdhlk ealaa 'akl amwalhm.
